meanings.definition: Pagandoms - plural noun: communities or societies that practice pagan beliefs
meanings.sent1: The pagandoms in our town gather every full moon to celebrate nature.
meanings.sent2: Many ancient civilizations had their own unique pagandoms.
meanings.sent3: The pagandoms decided to host a potluck to honor the changing seasons.
meanings.sent4: In the heart of the forest, the pagandoms danced under the stars.
meanings.sent5: The pagandoms' colorful rituals painted the sky with magic.

meanings.definition: Pagandoms - verb: the act of participating in pagan rituals or customs
meanings.sent1: We will pagandoms together during the upcoming solstice ceremony.
meanings.sent2: She loves to pagandoms with her friends during the harvest festival.
meanings.sent3: Let's pagandoms around the bonfire and share stories of old.
meanings.sent4: The entire village decided to pagandoms in honor of the ancient gods.
meanings.sent5: They will pagandoms joyfully, embracing the traditions of their ancestors.
